title: FAKE ALERT: Photo of couple shared as Covid-19-infected Italian doctors - Times of India
subtitle: News News: A photo of a young couple with masks undone, clicked at an airport, is being shared with a claim they are Italian doctors who contracted coronavirus i
author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
vclaim: An Instagram page posted a photo of a young couple, with masks undone, at an airport with a claim that they are Italian doctors who contracted coronavirus infection and died.The post said, "They both were doctors from Italy. Both died serving their nation on the 8th day. Before being isolated on 8th day they kissed each other and died after half and hour. God bless their soul."The post, by now, has gotten nearly a 1,00,000 likes on Instagram and is being widely shared.The same image is being shared on Twitter, Facebook and WhatsApp with similar claims.No, the man and the woman seen in the photo are not Italian doctors.Times Fact Check ran a simple reverse-image search on Google on the photo and found a link to a live blog on NBC News which carried the same image.The photo published under a subhead titled 'Love in the time of coronavirus', was captioned, "A couple kiss at the airport in Barcelona airport, Spain, on Thursday. Travelers scrambled to rebook flights and markets reeled on Thursday after President Donald Trump imposed sweeping restrictions on travel from Europe, hitting battered airlines and heightening global alarm over the coronavirus."The photo is credited to Emilio Morenatti Times Fact Check has found that a photo clicked at an airport in Barcelona, Spain, is being widely shared with a claim that the man and woman seen in the photo are Italian doctors who contracted coronavirus infection and died.
